biotools.summary: DisPredict is a predictor of disorder residues in protein. It takes protein sequence (standard FASTA format) as input and outputs per residue binary annotation (disorder or order) along with two real values corresponding to probability of that residue being disorder and order.

bioschemas.name: DisPredict2
